data: SPINE Post Operative Pain and Symptom Management
Admit/Transfer/Discharge
Do not initiate this PowerPlan if Perioperative Pain Service (POPS) or Anesthesiology is following this patient
Patient Care
Order for Duplicate Checking, do not modify
Medications
Opioid Analgesics (Standard Order - for Non Opioid Tolerant Patients)
None
Consider consulting with CPAS before placing analgesic orders
Immediate Release (Select ONE box only)
oxyCODONE PRN range dose
dose range: 2.5 to 5 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 10 to 15 mg, PO, q3h, pain, drug form: tab

dose range: 0.5 to 1 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 1 to 2 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 2 to 3 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab

dose range: 2.5 to 5 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, PO, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: tab
dose range: 10 to 15 mg, PO, q3h, pain, drug form: tab

dose range: 1 to 2 mg, subcutaneous, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: inj

dose range: 5 to 10 mg, subcutaneous, q3h, PRN pain, drug form: inj

Long Acting (LA) (Select ONE box only)
oxyCODONE long acting
mg, PO, q12h, drug form: tab-long acting
HYDROmorphone long acting
mg, PO, q12h, drug form: cap-long acting
morphine (M-ESLON) long acting
mg, PO, q12h, drug form: cap-long acting
IV breakthrough (Select ONE box only)
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.2 to 0.8 mg, IV, q10min, PRN pain-breakthrough, drug form: inj
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 1 to 4 mg, IV, q10min, PRN pain-breakthrough, drug form: inj
naloxone
0.1 mg, IV, q2min, PRN reverse opioid effect, order duration: 4 doses or times, drug form: inj, Until patient is awake
Sedation Assessment
If Sedation Score (POSS) greater than 3:
Respiratory Rate
If Respiratory Rate is 8/min or less:
Oxygen Therapy
10 L/min if naloxone required and notify treating provider
acetaminophen
975 mg, PO, q6h, drug form: tab
650 mg, PO, q4h, drug form: tab, while awake
650 mg, rectal, q6h, while awake
celecoxib
100 mg, PO, BID with food, order duration: 4 day, drug form: cap
ibuprofen
400 mg, PO, BID with food, order duration: 4 day, drug form: tab
diclofenac
50 mg, PO, BID with food, order duration: 4 day, drug form: tab
50 mg, rectal, BID, order duration: 4 day, drug form: supp
ketorolac
15 mg, IV, q8h, order duration: 24 hour, drug form: inj
ondansetron
4 mg, IV, q8h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
ondansetron
4 mg, PO, q8h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
metoclopramide PRN range dose
dose range: 5 to 10 mg, IV, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
dose range: 10 to 20 mg, IV, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj

dose range: 10 to 20 mg, PO, q6h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab

dose range: 25 to 50 mg, PO, q6h, nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
dose range: 12.5 to 25 mg, PO, q6h, nausea or vomiting, drug form: tab
dimenhyDRINATE PRN range dose
dose range: 25 to 50 mg, IV, q4h, PRN nausea or vomiting, drug form: inj
Naloxone not to be used for Opioid Induced Pruritus if patient is on methadone
naloxone
0.04 mg, IV, q15min, PRN itching, order duration: 4 doses or times, drug form: inj, Notify treating provider if pruritus does not improve after 4 doses. Monitor for increased pain scores.
diphenhydrAMINE
12.5 mg, IV, q4h, PRN itching, drug form: inj
diphenhydrAMINE
25 mg, PO, q4h, PRN itching, drug form: cap
